alert.note: Alert for Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 3:21PM EDT until June 02 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PISCATAQUIS COUNTY... At 321 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Elliottsville, or 12 miles northwest of Brownville Junction, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Dover-Foxcroft, Guilford, Brownville Junction, Elliottsville, Brownville, Willimantic, Bowerbank, Onawa, Barnard, Williamsburg and Katahdin Iron Works. This includes State Highway 11 near Brownville Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
